name: exercise machine
description: Typically used for, well, exercising.  You're getting quite enough of that; running for your life.  If you feel like pumping iron anyway, examine it to practice Athletics.

name: ball machine
description: An unpowered machine that seems like it could've been used to launch various balls for different types of sports.  It's mostly just good for parts if disassembled, but with grid power it could be used to practice Dodging.

name: pool table
description: A good-looking pool table.  You wish you learned how to play.

name: arcade machine
description: Play stupid games, win stupid prizes.  That was the idea, anyway.  Now, without power, it's just stupid.  Smarter to disassemble for all kinds of useful electronic parts.

name: pinball machine
description: Most underrated game of the 20th century.  Press buttons so the ball doesn't go in the hole.  It doesn't seem to be working without electricity.  Could be disassembled for various electronic parts.

name: ergometer
description: A rowing exercise machine, might have useful parts in it.  Examine it to practice your Athletics skill.

name: treadmill
description: Used for training leg muscles.  Could be taken apart for itsâ€¦ parts.  You could use it to practice Athletics, but this will require restoring power to it.

name: punching bag
description: Punch Punch!  Exercise those arms!  Main selling point: it doesn't fight back!  Examine it to practice your Unarmed skill.

name: dancing pole
description: Tall metal pole meant for dancing, attached on bottom and top.  Could practice your Dodging skill with it, if you're feeling expressive.
